entries.name: Abacus
entries.description: A wooden frame with beads that slide on rods.

entries.name: Ball of yard
entries.description: Balled yard that can be in a variety of colors.

entries.name: Barrel
entries.hidden properties: [STEALTH 12] Small creature can hide in a barrel easily.  Medium creature can squat in a barrel, but the lid could not close entirely.
entries.properties: Can usually hold 120 liters (30 gallons) of liquid.
entries.description: Sealed wooden container made of curved staves and metal rings.  Sealed with a lid or cork.

entries.name: Basket
entries.description: Woven cane or wood shaped to carry small objects.

entries.name: Book
entries.description: Simple leather book with any possible record written inside.

entries.name: Book - Abridged Book of Gyvth
entries.hidden properties:
[LORE 12] A condensed version of the Book of Gyvth with the basic history and most of the core doctrine. It is fairly common, and usually given freely by traveling templars to those who can read, write, and have political or governing power.
[ARCANA 15] The book is almost always scribed using sigil mimicry (essentially a magic-based printing press).
entries.description: Simple leather book of about 150 pages.

entries.name: Book - A History of the Progressive World
entries.hidden properties:
[LORE 12] A brief history of the reign of kings, dominion, and wars of Furistia. It is given as part of any official opening of an inn, town hall, or community center. It is arguably the most common book.
[LORE 19] Scholars speculate to the legitimacy of the books claims. It is obviously warped to alter history for Furistia's benefit, but some facts, even to the existence or outcomes of wars, are highly disputed.
[ARCANA 15] The book is almost always scribed using sigil mimicry (essentially a magic-based printing press).
entries.description: Simple leather book of about 600 pages.

entries.name: Book - The Art of Calligraphy
entries.hidden properties: If (40 - WIS check) hours are devoted to reading the book, +1 to the next Calligraphy point. This cannot be repeated.

entries.name: Book - The Smithing Apprentice
entries.hidden properties: If (40 - WIS check) hours are devoted to reading the book, +1 to the first Smithing point.

entries.name: Book - Journal of a Lone Woodsman
entries.hidden properties: If (40 - WIS check) hours are devoted to reading the book, +1 to the next Woodworking point. This cannot be repeated.

entries.name: Book - Dictionary of the Common Tongue
Book - Encyclopedia of the Furistian Kingdom
Book - Where the Moss Grows on the Tree
Book - Lord Galeman's Psalms
entries.description: "If you know not the path to choose, choose the path that chooses you." -pg. 142

entries.name: Book - Common Alements and Practical Cures
Book - Charms and Curses for the Commonfolk
Book - Tricks and Cantrips for the Commonfolk
Book - The Life of a Fungi.  The Non-Abridged Version.  Volume 1
Book - The Life of a Fungi.  The Non-Abridged Version.  Volume 2
Book - The Life of a Fungi.  The Non-Abridged Version.  Volume 3
Broom
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 15] Brooms are easier to enchant with a fly spell than other common items.
entries.description: Simple broom used for dusting.

entries.name: Bucket
entries.properties: Can hold a 4 liters (1 gallon) of liquid.
entries.description: Wooden bucket wrapped in iron bands with a wooden handle.

entries.name: Chest
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 12] Can be burst with a melee weapon and 15 STR check.
entries.properties: Can hold 1 ft by 3 ft worth of supplies.
entries.description: Wooden chest with an iron lock and frames.

entries.name: Clothes (rags)
entries.description: Cloth and hemp full-body clothing with rips and tears.

entries.name: Clothes (common)
entries.description: Cloth and hemp full-body clothing.

entries.name: Clothes (fine)
entries.description: Finely sewn colorful cloth full-body clothing.

entries.name: Clothes (extravagant)
entries.description: Masterfully sewn intricate silk and cloth full-body clothing.

entries.name: Iron chest
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Can be burst with a melee weapon and 25 STR check.
entries.properties: Can hold 1 ft by 3 ft worth of supplies.
entries.description: Iron chest with a lock.

entries.name: Glass bottle
entries.properties: Can hold a liter of liquid.
entries.description: A glass bottle, usually stopped with a cork.

entries.name: Hourglass
entries.properties: Keeps an accurate measurement of an hour.
entries.description: A wooden frame that holds two glass vials half full of fine sand.

entries.name: Jug
entries.description: A wooden container with a pouring spout and handle.

entries.name: Ladder
entries.properties: Can be placed against a wall to reach an extra 10 ft.
entries.description: A wooden ladder that stands 10 ft tall.

entries.name: Lamp
entries.properties: Can be lit and produce 30 ft radius of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: A clay lamp that is filled with oil and has a hempen wick.

entries.name: Pitcher
entries.description: A brass container with a pouring spout and handle.

entries.name: Tankard
entries.description: A brass cup with a curved handle.
